assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all subjects, and study procedures were compliant with the revised Helsinki Declaration of 2000. The study was approved by the Children’s Hospital of Eastern Ontario Research Ethics Board (#11/04E).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Francisca Millan is employed by GeneDx (MD, USA); the remaining authors declare no conflicts.
